pullRequest.title: Migrate version infos api
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue: #7482
Description: Migrating version_infos API from rails to spark keeping the version as v1

one difference - earlier if the user was not valid it use to return 404. Now it returns 403.

beforeCommit.message: Moving the toggle to default to spark api

afterCommit.message: Moving the toggle to default to spark api

beforeCommit.message: Moving the toggle to default to spark api

afterCommit.message: Moving the toggle to default to spark api

commit.message: Initial commit for version info api v1

Added toggle 'use_rails_version_infos_api' between the rails and spark based url
 - added stale api in spark controller
Add support for updating latest go_server info
Moving the toggle to default to spark api
